content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #138

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Add direct link to "Event Catalog"

Submitted by Ricardo Quintano Neira
Chapter/section: Event Notification Request Details
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: A-S Clarification

Summary: Add direct link to "Event Catalog"

Comment: Add direct link to "Event Catalog" in the following text

"The hub.event is a user workflow event, from the Event Catalog. "

Existing wording: The hub.event is a user workflow event, from the Event Catalog.

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

wmaethner commented on Issue #138:

## :landline: II Working Group Vote (6-18-2019)
Block vote

@isaacvetter moved the following disposition, seconded by Ricardo Quintano Neira

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment: Will fix as described in the issue comments or by the commenter

:+1: For: 10
:expressionless: Abstain: 2
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:

isaacvetter commented on Issue #138:

Due to the refactoring of the event catalog, we no longer has a single url that could be the target of an Event Catalog link; however, the event catalog is much more visible on the site due to its being on the menu.

I'm removing the broken link to fix this issue. This issue is also a duplicate of #169.
